description: Identifies use of various commands to query a systems time. This technique may be used before executing a scheduled task or to discover the time zone of a target system. Author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Endgame), oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate use of the system utilities to discover system time for legitimate reason
name: Discovery of a System Time
query: ((process.executable:(*\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe) AND process.command_line:*time*) OR (process.executable:*\\w32tm.exe AND process.command_line:*tz*) OR (process.executable:*\\powershell.exe AND process.command_line:*Get\-Date*))
